{
  "daily_summary": "Portfolio at ₹26,221.95 (+34.76% on invested ₹19,457.90). Equity allocation ₹17,472.00; cash ₹8,749.95 (~33%). Position sizes remain small and diversified with scope to deploy cash selectively into mid/smallcap momentum or high-quality pullbacks. Plan: hold core, queue buy-on-dips and buy-on-breakout orders for Monday; only 1 small emergency add is proposed to keep risk in check.",

    {"symbol": "IREDA", "signal": "Buy on dips to", "reason": "Renewables financing tailwinds; higher-lows structure intact", "price": 145.00},
    {"symbol": "KALYANKJIL", "signal": "Buy on dips to", "reason": "Store expansion and operating leverage; buy near rising averages", "price": 435.00},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Buy on dips to", "reason": "Rail capex pipeline visibility; buy-the-dip towards support", "price": 280.00}

    "Industrials/PSU: Watch RVNL pullbacks; sustain only if volume contraction on dips.",
    "Power/exchanges: IEX buy zone ~150; avoid chasing spikes above 160 without consolidation.",
    "Renewables: SUZLON only on confirmed breakout above 52; avoid averaging down on weakness.",
    "Renewables finance: IREDA accumulate near 145 with tight risk control.",
    "CDSL: Prefer staggered entries toward 2050; avoid if breakdown below 1980.",
